Help: This is your home page. Use this as a starting area to navigate across the portal. Use the tabs on the top to navigate you across different sections of the portal

This is the training page to manage your current training at the academy. The links on the page are as followed: - Evaluation - For providing feedback for your trainer and evaluate your experience at the academy - CV Management - For viewing and editing your current CV - Reflection - For adding and viewing reflections on your progress at the academy
